code: import React from'react';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export const VoiceSettings=_ref=>{let{settings,onSettingsChange}=_ref;const handleVoiceChange=voice=>{onSettingsChange({...settings,voice});};const handleSpeedChange=speed=>{onSettingsChange({...settings,speed});};const handlePitchChange=pitch=>{onSettingsChange({...settings,pitch});};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"voice-settings",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:"Voice Settings"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"settings-grid",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"setting-group",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{children:"Voice Type:"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"voice-buttons",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:`voice-btn ${settings.voice==='female'?'active':''}`,onClick:()=>handleVoiceChange('female'),children:"\uD83D\uDC69 Female"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:`voice-btn ${settings.voice==='male'?'active':''}`,onClick:()=>handleVoiceChange('male'),children:"\uD83D\uDC68 Male"})]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"setting-group",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("label",{children:["Speed: ",settings.speed,"x"]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"range",min:"0.5",max:"2.0",step:"0.1",value:settings.speed,onChange:e=>handleSpeedChange(parseFloat(e.target.value)),className:"slider"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"setting-group",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("label",{children:["Pitch: ",settings.pitch,"x"]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"range",min:"0.5",max:"2.0",step:"0.1",value:settings.pitch,onChange:e=>handlePitchChange(parseFloat(e.target.value)),className:"slider"})]})]})]});};
